name: I Awoke as a God After Auto Battling For a Million Years
author: 七猫免费小说
content: An otherworldly invasion begins as countless monsters pour through rifts, engulfing human cities and plunging humanity into a doomsday crisis! From this point, humanity enters an era of universal job transfers, with nations vying to train powerful professionals and compete for top rankings in the otherworldly conquest! When the number one ruler of the Dragon Kingdom, who has slumbered for millions of years, awakens with millions of years&#039 worth of idle resources, the bosses of the otherworld
